name: FileManager.DirectoryEnumerationOptions
desc: Options for enumerating the contents of directories.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a directory enumeration options value.

items.name: static var skipsSubdirectoryDescendants: FileManager.DirectoryEnumerationOptions
items.desc: An option to perform a shallow enumeration that doesnâ€™t descend into directories.

items.name: static var skipsPackageDescendants: FileManager.DirectoryEnumerationOptions
items.desc: An option to treat packages like files and not descend into their contents.

items.name: static var skipsHiddenFiles: FileManager.DirectoryEnumerationOptions
items.desc: An option to skip hidden files.
